Package org.spdx.maven.utils

Class SpdxDependencyInformation

java.lang.Object
org.spdx.maven.utils.SpdxDependencyInformation
public class SpdxDependencyInformation extends Object
Contains information about package dependencies collected from the Maven dependencies.
Author:
Gary O'Neall

    • addMavenDependencies

      public void addMavenDependencies(org.apache.maven.project.ProjectBuilder mavenProjectBuilder, org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession session, org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject mavenProject, org.apache.maven.shared.dependency.graph.DependencyNode node, SpdxElement pkg) throws LicenseMapperException, InvalidSPDXAnalysisException
      Adds information about Maven dependencies to the list of SPDX Dependencies
      Parameters:
      mavenProjectBuilder - project builder for the repo containing the POM file
      session - Maven session for building the project
      mavenProject - Maven project
      Throws:
      LicenseMapperException
      InvalidSPDXAnalysisException
